verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We bow low we bow low
Faces down to the ground in Your presence Lord
With our tears we wash Your feet
We bow low we bow low falling on our knees
We bow low we bow low
To the King of Kings

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Holy holy holy holy
Holy holy
Holy are You Lord forevermore

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Holy holy holy holy
Holy holy holy holy
Holy are You Lord
Holy holy are You Lord forevermore
